  • Constructor Details

    • CompanyRepresentative

      public CompanyRepresentative(String userId, String name, String email, String password, String companyName, String department, String position)
      Constructor for CompanyRepresentative
      Parameters:
      userId - Company representative ID (assigned upon approval)
      name - Representative's full name
      email - Company email address
      password - Representative's password
      companyName - Name of the company
      department - Department within the company
      position - Job position/title
